attributes.action: to award mr harry patch an obe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear mr brown i believe it is about time to reward mr HARRY PATCH with at least an obe in recognition of his sevice during the first world war , as he his the last TOMMY ,this would be the least this country could do , he could accept this award on behalf of all the people that fought for freedom .you yourself said you would like to see real heroes,recieving awards ,i beg you to act now before its to late

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
